mapper.sql: t.zdbwid zdbwid, t.zddwid zddwid, t.zdbwlx zdbwlx, t.zdbwmc zdbwmc, t.zdbwwz zdbwwz, t.wxxfx wxxfx, t.zysx zysx, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4

t2.uuid jzl_uuid, t2.zdbwid jzl_zdbwid, t2.syxz jzl_syxz, t2.jzjg jzl_jzjg, t2.qymj jzl_qymj, t2.gnms jzl_gnms, t2.cjrid jzl_cjrid, t2.cjrmc jzl_cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t2.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') jzl_cjsj, t2.xgrid jzl_xgrid, t2.xgrmc jzl_xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t2.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') jzl_xgsj, t2.delete_flag jzl_deleteFlag, t2.datasource jzl_datasource, t2.bz jzl_bz, t2.jdh jzl_jdh, TO_CHAR(t2.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') jzl_sjc, t2.reserve1 jzl_reserve1, t2.reserve2 jzl_reserve2, t2.reserve3 jzl_reserve3, TO_CHAR(t2.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') jzl_reserve4

t2.uuid zzl_uuid, t2.zdbwid zzl_zdbwid, t2.jzjg zzl_jzjg, t2.zdmj zzl_zdmj, t2.zzgd zzl_zzgd, t2.jsfzr zzl_jsfzr, t2.jsfzrdh zzl_jsfzrdh, t2.gylc zzl_gylc, t2.cjrid zzl_cjrid, t2.cjrmc zzl_cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t2.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') zzl_cjsj, t2.xgrid zzl_xgrid, t2.xgrmc zzl_xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t2.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') zzl_xgsj, t2.delete_flag zzl_deleteFlag, t2.datasource zzl_datasource, t2.bz zzl_bz, t2.jdh zzl_jdh, TO_CHAR(t2.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') zzl_sjc, t2.reserve1 zzl_reserve1, t2.reserve2 zzl_reserve2, t2.reserve3 zzl_reserve3, TO_CHAR(t2.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') zzl_reserve4

t2.uuid cgl_uuid, t2.zdbwid cgl_zdbwid, t2.zrj cgl_zrj, t2.cgsl cgl_cgsl, t2.cgjg cgl_cgjg, t2.ccjzms cgl_ccjzms, t2.jsfzr cgl_jsfzr, t2.jsfzrdh cgl_jsfzrdh, t2.blgxd cgl_blgxd, t2.blgxn cgl_blgxn, t2.blgxx cgl_blgxx, t2.blgxb cgl_blgxb, t2.cjrid cgl_cjrid, t2.cjrmc cgl_cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t2.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cgl_cjsj, t2.xgrid cgl_xgrid, t2.xgrmc cgl_xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t2.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cgl_xgsj, t2.delete_flag cgl_deleteFlag, t2.datasource cgl_datasource, t2.bz cgl_bz, t2.jdh cgl_jdh, TO_CHAR(t2.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cgl_sjc, t2.reserve1 cgl_reserve1, t2.reserve2 cgl_reserve2, t2.reserve3 cgl_reserve3, TO_CHAR(t2.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cgl_reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_ZDBW t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT
FROM YAGL_ZDBW t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS zdbwid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_ZDBW(zdbwid,zddwid,zdbwlx,zdbwmc,zdbwwz,wxxfx,zysx,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{zdbwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zddwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdbwlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdbwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdbwwz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{wxxfx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zysx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_ZDBW t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.ZDBWID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_ZDBW(zdbwid,zddwid,zdbwlx,zdbwmc,zdbwwz,wxxfx,zysx,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.zdbwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zdbwid,#{item.zddwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zddwid,#{item.zdbwlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zdbwlx,#{item.zdbwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zdbwmc,#{item.zdbwwz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zdbwwz,#{item.wxxfx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} wxxfx,#{item.zysx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zysx,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE zdbwid = VALUES(zdbwid), zddwid = VALUES(zddwid), zdbwlx = VALUES(zdbwlx), zdbwmc = VALUES(zdbwmc), zdbwwz = VALUES(zdbwwz), wxxfx = VALUES(wxxfx), zysx = VALUES(zysx), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM YAGL_ZDBW t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT ,
FROM YAGL_ZDBW t LEFT JOIN YAGL_ZDBW_JZL t2 ON(t.ZDBWID=t2.ZDBWID AND t2.DELETE_FLAG='N') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.ZDBWLX = '10' AND t.ZDDWID = #{value}

SELECT ,
FROM YAGL_ZDBW t LEFT JOIN YAGL_ZDBW_ZZL t2 ON(t.ZDBWID=t2.ZDBWID AND t2.DELETE_FLAG='N') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.ZDBWLX = '20' AND t.ZDDWID = #{value}

SELECT ,
FROM YAGL_ZDBW t LEFT JOIN YAGL_ZDBW_CGL t2 ON(t.ZDBWID=t2.ZDBWID AND t2.DELETE_FLAG='N') WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.ZDBWLX = '30' AND t.ZDDWID = #{value}
